body:
Hey all you mad scientists out there watching my youtube channel. I have recently in the last week uploaded my 1st nebula montage. I had a lot of fun playing and hope you have fun watching.mI am also switching to using fraps rather than ezvid, if you agree with my decision make sure to always watch my videos regularly.

Video link: https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=DW1OpKCciKA

Channel link: https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCk5xjVgC7TpZ1QnB3UWYENg

replies.body:
just watched it then, awesome video and IMO the recorder is awesome :D
Commented on the video, liked and subscribed; i enjoyed the whole thing :)
